ValidationRule.description: A user should use the buttons to accept or reject a case.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status), (RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Care_Request' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Care_Navigation'), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Accepted"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Rejected") ), Not(isChanged(Toggle__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must use the buttons to accept or reject a case. You can't do it manually.
